sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Slowly but surely, Ukraine claims to be making gains in the trenches of Bakhmut, but Russia says it has inflicted heavy losses on Kyiv's forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: President Putin gives Wagner fighters an ultimatum as Prigozhin insists he was avoiding bloodshed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: EU foreign affairs ministers urge caution in the aftermath of the armed uprising in Russia as the full consequences of the events play out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Dramatic helmet cam footage appears to show a gun battle in trenches near Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: near Bakhmut. The 3rd Brigade of the Ukrainian Army released the video said to show members of the brigade staging an assault on the 57th Motorized Rifle Brigade of the Russian Army.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Over the past few days, Ukraine has claimed to be making progress in the area near Bakhmut, but the gains are slow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia has not officially acknowledged Ukrainian advances and says it has inflicted heavy losses on Kyiv's forces in the previous 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has taken time to hand out medals to soldiers in the Donetsk region. On his return, he also stopped off at a gas station and posed for selfies with locals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Moscow says two of its fighter jets intercepted a British Royal Air Force reconnaissance plane and two Typhoon fighters when they entered Russian airspace over the Black Sea. They were escorted out of the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: After being notably absent from public view since the weekend's abortive mutiny, both Russian President Vladimir Putin and Wagner Group chief Yevgeny Prigozhin have reappeared.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Both have delivered recorded statements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Underlining Putin's five-minute address to the nation was that Russia had been saved by a sense of unity. This solidarity showed that any blackmail, attempts to create internal discord, is doomed to failure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I repeat, the highest consolidation of society, executive and legislative authorities at all levels was manifested.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: After condemning the armed mutiny in the strongest terms, the main message to the Wagner troops who had marched on Moscow was fight for Russia or leave for Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Putin's unscheduled appearance came just hours after Yevgeny Prigozhin issued a defiant 11-minute statement in which he said he had not intended to shed blood or sought to topple the Russian president. И нашим решением развернуться были два важнейших фактора.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Первый фактор – это то, что мы не хотели пролить русскую кровь.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Второй фактор – мы шли для демонстрации своего протеста, а не для свержения власти в стране. We went to demonstrate our protest, not to overthrow the government in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Putin blamed Western interference for the rebellion, but President Joe Biden has quickly denied US or NATO involvement, saying it's up to Russians to manage their affairs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Russians to manage their affairs. EU foreign ministers are urging caution in the aftermath of the armed uprising in Russia as the full consequences of the events are still playing out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: For some of them, what happened shows once again the risks that European countries have to face, with others pointing to what they call the grey areas of the current situation. des tensions intérieures, qu'il y a même des fissures, des fractures, des failles dans le dispositif.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ils ont mis en évidence l'ensemble des tensions au sein du CISM-Bus. kilometers away from Moscow. So imagine how fast can they do that crossing Belarus and appearing on Lithuania's border. So definitely we are very strongly asking our allies to look at our situation extremely seriously in the light of everything that is happening in Russia. And again, really to put out very specific plans as to how to reinforce the eastern flank, especially the countries that have a border with Russia and Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But it's not just risks coming from the events over the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The EU's top diplomat Joseph Borre says Ukraine and its allies could benefit from the chaos in the Russian system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Si tu adversario entra en un combate entre diferentes partes, es evidente que eso es una cosa positiva desde el punto de vista del desarrollo de las operaciones militares. military operations. Imagine that suddenly Wagner's troops have abandoned their positions in the front and have gone to do something else.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Therefore, that for the Ukrainians cannot be but positive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: While it's still unclear how the situation will evolve, one thing is certain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The EU will maintain its support for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Ministers agreed on an increase of 3.5 billion euros to the so-called European Peace Facility, an off-budget fund used to finance security and defence missions outside the EU. It now amounts to 12 billion euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The largest part of this money has been pledged to provide weapons and military assistance to Ukraine, even if Hungary is blocking the release of the next amount worth as much as 500 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Israel's far-right government has approved plans to build thousands of new homes in illegal Israeli settlements in the occupied West Bank. More than 5,000 units are at various stages of planning and it is not immediately clear when construction would begin. The international community along with the Palestinians considers settlement construction illegal and an obstacle to peace. The decision comes amid rising violence in the occupied territory and growing criticism of Israel settlement policy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Anderson Lee Aldrich, seen here on the left, has pleaded guilty to the 2022 mass shooting

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: at a Colorado Springs LGBTQ plus nightclub.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: His plea and sentencing to life in prison spares victims, families and survivors a long and potential painful trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Five people died when the gunman walked into Club Q and indiscriminately fired an AR-15 style semi-automatic rifle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Aldrich will serve five consecutive life sentences plus 48 years on each attempted murder, totalling an additional 2,208 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: There won't be too much sleep for the people of Sibiu in Romania this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The 30th edition of the Sibiu International Theatre Festival takes place with music and street performances from dawn until dusk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Among the visitors is the Pied Piper of Hamelin, coming to rid the town of rats. Except these rodents make friends with some of the spectators. The 10-day International Theatre Festival takes place from June 23 until July 2.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This area in central Rome was first discovered in the 1920s, but only recently it has opened to the public.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And it's not like any other archaeological sites in the Italian capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: It's the spot where Roman history changed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Here, in fact, is where ancient Rome's most powerful leader was stabbed to death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: For the first time, visitors can actually see where Julius Caesar was assassinated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: His killing took place beyond those walls over there. He was one of the most significant figures of Western history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: His life marked the transition from the Roman Republic to the Roman Empire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Julius Caesar is supposed to have died inside the Pompis Curia, a large rectangular hall that hosted the Senate. la Pompis Curia, una grande piazza rettangolare che ha hostato il Senato. È stato possibile riconoscere il muro di fondo di quell'aula che ospitò l'efferato evento, un muro che è possibile attribuire con certezza a quell'edificio, vedere esattamente il punto esatto dove si è svolto l'episodio, sicuramente aggiunge emozione e aggiunge la capacità di pensarsi parte di quella storia. Per la prima volta i visitanti saranno capaci di passare attraverso il sito a livello di terra For the first time, visitors will be able to move through the site at a ground level and see the remains of the buildings from up close.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A museum space with items collected during excavations is also accessible to the public.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I've always read it in history books, what happened to be where history was so significant. In the making, just a few footsteps away, it's overwhelming. I libri storici, cosa è successo, dove la storia è stata così significativa, in creazione, solo pochi passaggi in avanti, è straordinario.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I dettagli nuovi di quel periodo storico sono rivelati.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Qui abbiamo una Roma con materiali più poveri, il tufo, il peperino, il travertino, che però ci documentano un modo di fare architettura, un modo di costruire soprattutto gli edifici sacri che conosciamo molto poco.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Insieme con i turisti, i cittadini romani hanno anche benvenuto l'opera nuova.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Il vero romano è quello che conosce bene Roma e i suoi siti archeologici perché ci rinveglia tutto il mondo. The new archaeological site is the latest and most significant addition to the Italian capital's tourist attractions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Giorgio Orlandi for EURE News in Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Real Madrid have announced a one-year contract extension for 37-year-old Croatian midfielder Luka Modric.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Modric's contract was to expire at the end of the month, but he's decided to stay despite strong interest from clubs in Saudi Arabia. The 2018 Ballon d'Or winner has played 488 games and won 23 trophies during his 11 seasons at the club, including five Champions Leagues.
